video.title: CSI: Miami
video.synopsis: A former homicide detective leads a team of investigators and forensic experts in solving crimes on the Miami streets in this spin-off crime series.

episodes.synopsis: Megan Donner returns to the CSI unit in time to work on a jet crash in the Everglades. They discover a victim five miles from the crash.
episodes.title: Golden Parachute

episodes.synopsis: When his mentor is killed while defusing a bomb, Horatio goes on a personal mission to find the culprit. Megan wonders if he is too close to the case.
episodes.title: Losing Face

episodes.synopsis: After fishermen catch a tiger shark and discover a partial human torso in its stomach, evidence leads the team to suspect murder.
episodes.title: Wet Foot/Dry Foot

episodes.synopsis: When a rape and a murder takes place on a Miami beach, Horatio and the team are sent to investigate the mansion of the Hamilton family.
episodes.title: Just One Kiss

episodes.synopsis: When a priest is murdered, Horatio and the team must investigate. A lip print on a drinking glass sets a 12-year-old altar boy as a prime suspect.
episodes.title: Ashes to Ashes

episodes.synopsis: 5-year-old girl is murdered at a restaurant/play land catering to parents and children, and Horatio and the team must investigate.
episodes.title: Broken

episodes.synopsis: Horatio and the team investigate the murder of a male stripper found dead after a female sex party. Evidence suggests he had sex prior to his death.
episodes.title: Breathless

episodes.synopsis: When a family is slaughtered in their home, Horatio and the team try to find the killer with the evidence left at the scene.
episodes.title: Slaughterhouse

episodes.synopsis: Three people are shot and killed in downtown Miami during rush hour and Horatio and the team must catch the killer fast.
episodes.title: Kill Zone

episodes.synopsis: A professor from a local university is found hanging from a tree after being tortured, she had been tortured for at least 4 hours before the hanging.
episodes.title: A Horrible Mind

episodes.synopsis: When an unidentified girl is found dead near a very strict rehabilitation camp, Horatio and the team investigate her murder.
episodes.title: Camp Fear

episodes.synopsis: Horatio and the team are called to investigate when a prostitute is found stabbed to death and stuffed under a bed after the body was cleaned.
episodes.title: Entrance Wound

episodes.synopsis: When it's revealed that a ring of underground labs are manufacturing deadly drugs, Horatio and Speedle investigate the situation.
episodes.title: Bunk

episodes.synopsis: Horatio and Speedle investigate when a burglar and rapist has been sexually assaulted and taped to his bedposts after being suffocated to death.
episodes.title: Forced Entry

episodes.synopsis: Horatio and the team are exposed to radiation while investigating a murder, which leads them to an environmental lawyer dying of radiation poisoning.
episodes.title: Dead Woman Walking

episodes.synopsis: Horatio and the team are called to investigate the murder of an eastern European immigrant stabbed to death in a peep show booth.
episodes.title: Evidence of Things Unseen

episodes.synopsis: Horatio and his team race to find new evidence for a murder trial already underway in order to avoid the conviction of a possibly innocent man.
episodes.title: Simple Man

episodes.synopsis: It was supposed to be a routine undercover trip to the incinerator to dispose of drug evidence, but the police officers are ambushed.
episodes.title: Dispo Day

episodes.synopsis: Horatio's case of a murdered woman is compromised when the federal agents, who have their own agenda to follow, get involved.
episodes.title: Double Cap

episodes.synopsis: An ex-con who Horatio sent to jail asks him to help find his missing son. He finds marijuana while searching the boy's room.
episodes.title: Grave Young Men

episodes.synopsis: Students from all over the country descend on Miami for a week of fun in the sun. The party comes to a halt when the CSIs are called in on two cases.
episodes.title: Spring Break

episodes.synopsis: Speedle and Delko are enjoying a hot Miami night spot, "Club Descent," when the DJ's pyrotechnics triggers a fire that engulfs the club.
episodes.title: Tinder Box

episodes.synopsis: The CSIs delve into the "tweaker" culture after a brutal murder and near-fatal explosion takes place at the home of a meth amphetamine addict.
episodes.title: Freaks and Tweaks

episodes.synopsis: When Horatio is called to the Miami West Detention Center to investigate a murdered inmate, he ends up witnessing three inmates escape.
episodes.title: Body Count

episodes.synopsis: After a young model is killed by a hit and run driver, Horatio investigates the car's owner, who claims he loaned it out to the guests at his party.
episodes.title: Blood Brothers

episodes.synopsis: A man harpooned to his yacht leads Horatio into the world of modern-day treasure hunting and the massive greed that goes along with it.
episodes.title: Dead Zone

episodes.synopsis: When a former rape victim is beaten to within inches of her life, Horatio must enter the world of prisons and parolees to find the culprit.
episodes.title: Hard Time

episodes.synopsis: Tennis phenom Lana Walker is taken from her bedroom in the night and the only evidence they have to go on is a purple fiber found in the window frame.
episodes.title: Death Grip

episodes.synopsis: When a robbery/homicide leaves two men dead and a third still alive, Horatio is determined to find out what really happened.
episodes.title: The Best Defense

episodes.synopsis: Todd Burton is trying to drive out of the hurricane's fury when he kills a man in the blinding storm and is now accused of vehicular manslaughter.
episodes.title: Hurricane Anthony

episodes.synopsis: A gas man is engulfed in invisible flames and dies all of which happens during a qualifying race at the Grand Prix Americas.
episodes.title: Grand Prix

episodes.synopsis: Horatio finally closes the case of his brother's murder. He is reunited with Suzie, a former drug user who was involved with his brother.
episodes.title: Big Brother

episodes.synopsis: After a woman is witnessed being attacked by a shark, the CSIs learn that she was murdered prior to being dumped in the water.
episodes.title: Bait

episodes.synopsis: A young woman is thrown over the railing of a parking garage, the investigation into her death uncovers evidence that she was killed before the fall.
episodes.title: Extreme

episodes.synopsis: After a plastic surgery anesthesiologist is found dead from an apparent suicide, Horatio thinks that this could be a case of murder.
episodes.title: Complications

episodes.synopsis: A diamond broker is shot to death in a parking garage, a mentally disabled man witnessed the murder and wants to help Horatio solve the crime.
episodes.title: Witness To Murder

episodes.synopsis: When a man, Juan Marco Varon, who may or may not have tortured Cuban refuges is murdered, the CSIs are called in to investigate.
episodes.title: Blood Moon

episodes.synopsis: In the Everglades, near a controlled burn, Alexx and Delko search the crime scene. They are forced to take cover when a wall of fire overtakes them.
episodes.title: Slow Burn

episodes.synopsis: Horatio and his team delve into the world of celebrity and investigate the murder of a paparazzi. He discovers the victim witnessed another murder.
episodes.title: Stalkerazzi

episodes.synopsis: Ted Henderson is killed in his own home and his body is missing, while his wife and son are left alive, but beaten and bound.
episodes.title: Invasion

episodes.synopsis: Horatio is quick to arrive on the scene when an armored truck carrying 3.2 million dollars is robbed in a daring downtown heist.
episodes.title: Money for Nothing

episodes.synopsis: Wally Shmagin literally becomes part of a murder crime scene after he steals a latex glove to add to his personal forensic collection.
episodes.title: Wannabe

episodes.synopsis: A slippery journalist is the only witness to a murder, and Horatio suspects that he may be looking for a much bigger story.
episodes.title: Deadline

episodes.synopsis: When a police officer is shot to death while on the job, the CSIs track who he saw while that night and learn that he picked-up a call girl.
episodes.title: The Oath

episodes.synopsis: CSIs investigate the lives of those living in a high-end airpark after a prop plane crashes into a local Miami beach hot spot.
episodes.title: Not Landing

episodes.synopsis: A security guard is found dead after shots ring out at rap star 10-Large's concert and the CSI are called in to investigate.
episodes.title: Rap Sheet

episodes.synopsis: When evidence at a murder investigation leads the CSIs to believe the killer may be in NYC, Horatio takes his investigation to the Big Apple.
episodes.title: MIA/NYC - Non Stop

episodes.synopsis: An adult film actress is found strangled to death in the park and the CSIs are called in to investigate and find the killer.
episodes.title: Innocent

episodes.synopsis: A dangerous investigation leads the CSI team down a treacherous road that will lead to the tragic loss of one of their own.
episodes.title: Lost Son

episodes.synopsis: Yelina's life is in danger when the Horatio and the CSI team works a case to convict a rapper suspected of a Miami-style drive-by.
episodes.title: Pro Per

episodes.synopsis: A woman is pushed in front of a moving Metrorail train and both her boyfriend and his stalker ex girlfriend are suspected of her murder.
episodes.title: Under the Influence

episodes.synopsis: A flash mob erupts on a private golf course, were the group of students there to hide a body, or were they there to leave one.
episodes.title: Murder in a Flash

episodes.synopsis: Miami's club scene turns deadly when underage drinking sparks a bloody murder in a bathroom stall, Horatio and the CSI team investigate.
episodes.title: Legal

episodes.synopsis: A jury field trip to the scene of a murder flips the legal tables when the defendant ends up dead and the twelve jurors become the prime suspects.
episodes.title: Hell Night

episodes.synopsis: Miami Beach is evacuated for a tsunami, but the CSI team remains after discovering a bank robbery plot while investigating a seemingly random murder.
episodes.title: Crime Wave

episodes.synopsis: A "Speed Dating" night for Miami singles turns deadly for one South Beach stud who finds himself on the wrong end of a tire iron.
episodes.title: Speed Kills

episodes.synopsis: A string of dead bodies, found off the coast of Miami, turns out to be the work of modern-day pirates. Horatio and the team investigates.
episodes.title: Pirated

episodes.synopsis: An innocent man is killed when someone falls on him from a balcony. The CSI team are lead into the center of a high-level sex and murder scandal.
episodes.title: After the Fall

episodes.synopsis: A seemingly random carjacking turns out to be anything but when a young woman's gambling addiction becomes more than the family business can support.
episodes.title: Addiction

episodes.synopsis: A hospital emergency room shootout investigation puts the CSI team in the middle of a murder case involving the leader of a prominent street gang.
episodes.title: Shootout

episodes.synopsis: A routine traffic stop ends in the murder of a patrolman. The CSI team must sort out a young girl's obsessive love affair in order to find the killer.
episodes.title: Cop Killer

episodes.synopsis: A string of dead bodies found off the coast of Miami turns out to be the work of modern-day pirates. Horatio and the team investigate.
episodes.title: One Night Stand

episodes.synopsis: Horatio faces a former nemesis who escaped his grasp once before, a case of stolen identity leads to murder, the question becomes "which one did it?"
episodes.title: Identity

episodes.synopsis: Florida's gator and snake-infested Everglades becomes ground zero for a number of unrelated murders just as fires engulf the rare eco-system.
episodes.title: Nothing to Lose

episodes.synopsis: When a small jet crashes into a residential neighborhood, the wreckage reveals a corpse in the cargo hold, along with a half-million dollars in cash.
episodes.title: Money Plane

episodes.synopsis: The world of extreme skateboard videos turns deadly when the competition heats up inside the studio. Horatio and the CSI team investigate.
episodes.title: Game Over

episodes.synopsis: Tax season gets off to a bang when two IRS agents turn up dead. Horatio Caine and the CSI Team are called in to investigate.
episodes.title: Sex & Taxes

episodes.synopsis: South Beach Miami's sexiest nightclub becomes a hotbed of revenge when murder closes the doors on a unique dating service.
episodes.title: Killer Date

episodes.synopsis: An eight year-old girl becomes the innocent pawn in an ugly and abusive game that ends in murder. Horatio and the CSI team investigate.
episodes.title: Recoil

episodes.synopsis: A high school reunion turns deadly when a classmate acts on a 15 year old grudge, Horatio and Yelina discover that Ray may still be alive.
episodes.title: Vengeance

episodes.synopsis: The CSI Team works against a ticking clock to find the purported accomplice in a years-old ax-murder case before the convicted killer is executed.
episodes.title: Whacked

episodes.synopsis: The CSI team races against time to locate and deactivate a radioactive bomb set to go off in the middle of downtown Miami.
Horatio and the CSI team face off with Miami's notorious and deadly Mala Noche gang after a funeral becomes the scene of a murder.
episodes.title: From the Grave

episodes.synopsis: A family boating accident reveals a sinister plot by grifters to heist 10 million dollars in gold bars. Horatio and the CSI team investigate.
episodes.title: Blood in the Water

episodes.synopsis: The team investigates the murder of a teenage girl partying in Miami on her way to the Bahamas with her high school class.
episodes.title: Prey

episodes.synopsis: A young man faces life in prison -- and possibly worse -- unless Horatio can prove his innocence against insurmountable odds.
episodes.title: 48 Hours to Life

episodes.synopsis: When a "wives weekend" ends in murder, the CSI team is faced with three women whose separate trysts with the victim make them prime suspects.
episodes.title: Three-Way

episodes.synopsis: Horatio and the team race against time to find out who is trying to frame Horatio for the murder of a woman he's been dating.
episodes.title: Under Suspicion

episodes.synopsis: The team works in tandem with NY CSI chief Mac Taylor to apprehend a serial killer before he kills the young girl he has just taken hostage.
episodes.title: Felony Flight

episodes.synopsis: Ryan Wolfe is attacked and seriously injured while investigating the murder of a distraught soon-to-be ex-wife, and there is no shortage of suspects.
episodes.title: Nailed

episodes.synopsis: Horatio and the CSI team must rely on a video game for their next clue as to where a group of young gunmen will strike next.
episodes.title: Urban Hellraisers

episodes.synopsis: The CSI team is hard-pressed to find the killer of an infamous drug lord, and a member of the team is investigated for drugs by Internal Affairs.
episodes.title: Shattered

episodes.synopsis: A rapist is brutally murdered after his identity is exposed. Horatio and CSI team are called in to investigate the murder.
episodes.title: Payback

episodes.synopsis: Horatio and the CSI team investigate a group of male "pickup artists" out to score when one of them unexpectedly turns up dead.
episodes.title: The Score

episodes.synopsis: Miami's Latin Festival shifts from Samba to somber when a crowded dance floor becomes the scene of a gang member's murder.
episodes.title: Silencer

episodes.synopsis: A bizarre murder of a South Beach club owner turns out to be a script where art is imitating life. Horatio and the CSI team investigate.
episodes.title: Fade Out

episodes.synopsis: Horatio's longtime criminal nemesis Walter Resden surfaces once again, and Caine is determined to finally bring him to justice.
episodes.title: Skeletons

episodes.synopsis: Alex campaigns against a sex offender who moves into her neighborhood, then becomes embroiled in controversy when the man is murdered soon thereafter.
episodes.title: Deviant

episodes.synopsis: What begins as a case of apparent Road Rage leads the CSI team to the investigation of a stolen $4 million necklace, which is tied to a murder.
episodes.title: Collision

episodes.synopsis: When a white supremacist is acquitted for the murder of his wife after learning she is racially mixed, it's up to Horatio to bring the killer down.
episodes.title: Double Jeopardy

episodes.synopsis: A band of masked gunmen invade an upscale spa, with the female customers' luxury cars as their booty. A customer is injured in the melee.
episodes.title: Driven

episodes.synopsis: The bodies of two men, shot execution-style, are discovered in an abandoned hotel slated for demolition. Horatio and the CSI team investigate.
episodes.title: Free Fall

episodes.synopsis: A cell phone call leads the team to investigate a kidnapping that, unless they reach the victim before it's too late, could soon become a murder.
episodes.title: Dead Air

episodes.synopsis: While investigating the disappearance of a cruise ship passenger, the team discovers that a murder has also taken place on the ship.
episodes.title: Open Water

episodes.synopsis: A young, ultra glam heiress and media darling is found electrocuted in her bathtub during a party, and there is no shortage of suspects.
episodes.title: Shock

episodes.synopsis: The CSI Team is on high alert when the deadly Mala Noche gang initiates a shooting rampage during the trial of one of their members.
episodes.title: Rampage

episodes.synopsis: Horatio's search for Antonio Riaz continues. The Feds take over the lab and investigate each team member when $12,000 is missing from a drug bust.
episodes.title: One of Our Own

episodes.synopsis: Caine and Delko search for drug kingpin Antonio Riaz in Rio de Janeiro with little help from the corrupt Brazilian authorities.
episodes.title: Rio

episodes.synopsis: Crucial evidence against a gunrunning biker gang is tainted when Calleigh crashes into a canal. Battling the clock, the CSIs must gather evidence.
episodes.title: Going Under

episodes.synopsis: The murder of a socialite leads the CSIs to an offshore "celebrity death pool" controlled by a corrupt country that pays the winners in bogus C-notes.
episodes.title: Death Pool 100

episodes.synopsis: When two male models turn up dead, the CSIs investigate the not-so-glamorous side of modeling agencies.
episodes.title: If Looks Could Kill

episodes.synopsis: A city councilman's corpse is found in a vacant house. As the case unfolds, the CSIs discover that he planned to oust residents from their homes.
episodes.title: Death Eminent

episodes.synopsis: When odd accidents begin happening at the CSI lab as Halloween approaches, Wolfe and the CSIs fear he may have inadvertently invoked a Santeria curse.
episodes.title: Curse of the Coffin

episodes.synopsis: When a daredevil is decapitated during a stunt gone wrong, the CSIs immerse themselves in the world of hotrod sideshows.
episodes.title: High Octane

episodes.synopsis: A serial killer posing as a photographer is abducting and murdering young women all over Miami, and Natalia's missing sister may become a victim.
episodes.title: Darkroom

episodes.synopsis: A pretty bachelorette is auctioned at a charity auction -- and then murdered. The CSI team learns that the woman was an undercover government agent.
episodes.title: Going, Going, Gone

episodes.synopsis: When a Marine recruiter's body is discovered on a public shooting range, the leatherneck's brother claims he's the killer.
episodes.title: Come As You Are

episodes.synopsis: After a terrorist cell's defense attorney is fatally shot, the CSIs discover the intended target was Sonya Barak, the cell's leader.
episodes.title: Backstabbers

episodes.synopsis: Natalia is suspected of murder when Nick is found dead. With help from the nightshift CSIs and Calleigh's ex-beau, Caine fights to clear Natalia.
episodes.title: Internal Affairs

episodes.synopsis: Shortly after a landmine kills an illegal immigrant, Caine and the Miami bomb squad rush to rescue Tripp from a second explosive.
episodes.title: Throwing Heat

episodes.synopsis: To help Caine's longtime foe Clavo Cruz escape from custody, a truck carrying confiscated arms is robbed -- putting two CSIs in grave danger.
episodes.title: No Man's Land

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of the attack on a Miami courthouse, Caine rushes Delko to the hospital. The remaining CSI team dig up evidence needed to find Clavo Cruz.
episodes.title: Man Down

episodes.synopsis: The CSI probe into the double murder of a baby-sitter's parents exposes a scandalous love triangle as the motive.
episodes.title: Broken Home

episodes.synopsis: When a grizzly bear devours a hunter in the Everglades, the CSIs suspect he was human bait. The team connects the death to an illegal business.
episodes.title: A Grizzly Murder

episodes.synopsis: A real-estate tycoon's murder leads the CSIs to believe his wife or her sisters killed him. But the team discovers a link to a more likely suspect.
episodes.title: Triple Threat

episodes.synopsis: After a gaming official tries to skim profits at an Indian casino, his scalped corpse is found nearby. His murder is linked to a hooker's homicide.
episodes.title: Bloodline

episodes.synopsis: A troubled actor's corpse turns up in a stunt car's trunk. But evidence shows that the victim was killed at an upscale rehab facility for celebrities.
episodes.title: Rush

episodes.synopsis: A high-profile divorce goes from bitter to deadly when the husband's mistress is murdered. Across town, Delko finds his life in danger.
episodes.title: Just Murdered

episodes.synopsis: Caine learns that Yelina is back in town. Meanwhile, a CSI's personal relationship with an arson suspect threatens to compromise the investigation.
episodes.title: Burned

episodes.synopsis: Wolfe becomes a reluctant antagonist when he works as a television crime analyst. Meanwhile, the CSIs attempt to solve the murder of a carjacker.
episodes.title: Kill Switch

episodes.synopsis: A serial killer who brands his victims has the women of Miami terrified, and the murderer sets his sights on a member of Caine's team.
episodes.title: Born To Kill

episodes.synopsis: When probation officer Andrew Bennett is murdered, evidence leads Horatio to two parolees who were under Bennett's watch.
episodes.title: Dangerous Son

episodes.synopsis: When a photo of a teenage swimmer makes its way around the Web, the girl becomes an overnight celebrity -- and a target of obsessed fans.
episodes.title: Cyber-lebrity

episodes.synopsis: A prison bus crashes, and Kyle escapes along with the rest of the inmates. Kyle eventually turns himself in, but he could be in danger.
episodes.title: Inside Out

episodes.synopsis: Two friends in debt attempt suicide to escape financial woes. The CSIs suspect that a bank employee may have pushed one of the victims over the edge.
episodes.title: Bang, Bang, Your Debt

episodes.synopsis: A football legend is stabbed to death, and his body is cryogenically frozen. The CSIs work around this obstacle by performing a virtual autopsy.
episodes.title: Deep Freeze

episodes.synopsis: When the CSI team investigates two murders that occurred during a solar eclipse, they're faced with an odd piece of evidence: wolf hormones.
episodes.title: Sunblock

episodes.synopsis: When a model is electrocuted at a fashion show, the CSIs suspect foul play. Horatio believes that an inmate who threatened his son may be responsible.
episodes.title: Chain Reaction

episodes.synopsis: When a Canadian family takes a vacation in Miami, one member is murdered. The CSIs make catching the killer a priority.
episodes.title: Permanent Vacation

episodes.synopsis: While off duty, Calleigh escapes an attempt on her life, but a bystander is killed. Calleigh faces trouble when it's learned she'd been drinking.
episodes.title: Stand Your Ground

episodes.synopsis: When a nanny is murdered, suspicion falls on the wealthy family she worked for -- particularly on its jealous matriarch.
episodes.title: CSI: My Nanny

episodes.synopsis: A high-tech weapon nicknamed "the vaporizer" spreads terror across Miami when an unknown killer uses it to obliterate three smugglers.
episodes.title: Guerillas in the Mist

episodes.synopsis: A woman is found murdered in her apartment, which she had converted into a meth lab. The CSIs learn that she was a police informant.
episodes.title: Miami Confidential

episodes.synopsis: Kyle's femme fatale mother, Julia, becomes the prime suspect in the murder of her billionaire husband as Kyle stands trial for kidnapping.
episodes.title: Raising Caine

episodes.synopsis: When the bride of a pro ballplayer is shot on her wedding day, the CSI team's list of suspects ranges from a stripper to the slugger's bodyguard.
episodes.title: You May Now Kill the Bride

episodes.synopsis: Trouble rocks the CSI lab when Julia has Horatio extradited to Brazil to face murder charges. Meanwhile, someone is stalking Calleigh.
episodes.title: Ambush

episodes.synopsis: Calleigh is abducted by two young men who want her to help cover up a murder they committed. Horatio returns from Brazil and races to rescue Calleigh.
episodes.title: All In

episodes.synopsis: The team assumes that a vigilante is at work when two men accused of preying on young girls are murdered. But Horatio discovers an unlikely killer.
episodes.title: To Kill a Predator

episodes.synopsis: A murder connected to a bank robbery takes a twist when the CSIs discover a video of a drug dealer cavorting with the daughter of an important man.
episodes.title: Tunnel Vision

episodes.synopsis: The team processes a slab of rock that killed a jet skier, and Alexx recognizes it as construction material from her yard.
episodes.title: Rock and a Hard Place

episodes.synopsis: A man is killed by a SWAT team after an anonymous 911 caller accuses him of attacking his family, but the CSIs discover that the victim was set up.
episodes.title: Down to the Wire

episodes.synopsis: When the new medical examiner is killed by a sniper, Horatio risks his life to protect the rest of the team from illegal arms dealers.
episodes.title: Going Ballistic

episodes.synopsis: During their investigation into the Horatio Caine shooting, the CSI team pulls out all the stops to track down the gunman.
episodes.title: Resurrection

episodes.synopsis: The residents of Miami are so fed up with the exorbitant prices of gasoline that they're willing to kill for it.
episodes.title: Won't Get Fueled Again

episodes.synopsis: Delko's secrets are at risk after his therapist's daughter is killed. Horatio and the other CSIs work quickly, hoping to solve the case.
episodes.title: And How Does That Make You Kill?

episodes.synopsis: After a horrific double murder in the Everglades, Horatio and the team have to face off against none other than the Russian mob.
episodes.title: Raging Cannibal

episodes.synopsis: When an explosion rips through a chic Miami boutique, killing a young woman, the team learns that the bomb was stashed in a very unlikely spot.
episodes.title: Bombshell

episodes.synopsis: Horatio's hopes of convicting a crime lord are dashed when a crane smashes into the side of a skyscraper, destroying a key piece of the puzzle.
episodes.title: Wrecking Crew

episodes.synopsis: A woman wakes up in a hotel room next to a man who was handcuffed and stabbed to death, but the last thing she remembers is having a drink with him.
episodes.title: Cheating Death

episodes.synopsis: The clock is ticking as Horatio and his team race to rescue a baby who was abducted. The panicked mother wants to pay the kidnapper's ransom.
episodes.title: Gone Baby Gone

episodes.synopsis: When clues surrounding a woman's murder match past unsolved crimes, Horatio intercedes to stop a member of the police force from getting too close.
episodes.title: Power Trip

episodes.synopsis: A man tracks Delko to a motel and shoots him, but the CSI sustains only minor injuries. The team tries to figure out who might be gunning for him.
episodes.title: The DeLuca Motel

episodes.synopsis: The CSI team joins forces with members of a close-knit community, facing off against a street gang that's menacing the once-peaceful neighborhood.
episodes.title: Tipping Point

episodes.synopsis: Horatio finds a man wandering the streets in bloody clothes. The blood is from three different people, but the man has no memory of what happened.
episodes.title: Head Case

episodes.synopsis: A day at the track turns deadly when a man is shot in the back of the neck with a bolt gun, and the victim was involved with many shady characters.
episodes.title: And They're Offed

episodes.synopsis: Calleigh and Alex are examining a dead body in the attic of a foreclosed house when gunshots pierce the floor beneath them.
episodes.title: Smoke Gets in Your CSIs

episodes.synopsis: Sean "P. Diddy" Combs guest stars as Derek Powell, a prominent defense attorney who claims to have witnessed a murder.
episodes.title: Presumed Guilty

episodes.synopsis: Just as Delko and Calleigh's friendship turns into romance, disaster strikes: Delko faces a death threat and gets picked up by the INS.
episodes.title: Sink or Swim

episodes.synopsis: A divorced woman throws a party to celebrate her new single status, but the festivities are interrupted by the arrival of her ex-husband's dead body.
episodes.title: Divorce Party

episodes.synopsis: When an attractive flight attendant is murdered, the CSIs have their hands full investigating the suspects who shared her close quarters.
episodes.title: Flight Risk

episodes.synopsis: When a string of home invasions terrorizes Miami's richest residents, the investigation reveals a connection to the Russian mob.
episodes.title: Target Specific

episodes.synopsis: Russian mobsters put Ryan in a morally compromising position, compelling him to hide evidence in a robbery-homicide.
episodes.title: Wolfe in Sheep's Clothing

episodes.synopsis: When a plastic surgeon gets put through a wood chipper, it's up to CSI to find out whodunit. Meanwhile, Ron Saris returns to exact revenge on Julia.
episodes.title: Chip/Tuck

episodes.synopsis: A bachelorette looking for love on a reality TV series is found murdered in a limousine, just before the show's bachelor could propose to her.
episodes.title: Dead on Arrival

episodes.synopsis: In one of the most puzzling cases they've ever tried to crack, the CSI team look into the reasons for a brutal attack on an everyday American family.
episodes.title: Collateral Damage

episodes.synopsis: While the CSIs investigate the gruesome murder of a man found boiled to death in a vat of chemicals, Tara's drug habit comes to light.
episodes.title: Dissolved

episodes.synopsis: Despite Calleigh's protests, Eric takes a walk on the dark side to help out his criminal father, putting his own life in danger.
episodes.title: Seeing Red

episodes.synopsis: As Delko's life hangs in the balance, Horatio flashes back 12 years to reveal how Miami's CSIs first met and became a team.
episodes.title: Out Of Time

episodes.synopsis: When the lab is attacked, Horatio must fulfill a gunman's unique request in order to save five hostages, including new CSI Jesse Cardoza.
episodes.title: Hostile Takeover

episodes.synopsis: Three volleyball players mysteriously drop dead on the court while Calleigh's testimony against Delko threatens his future as a CSI.
episodes.title: Bolt Action

episodes.synopsis: When the most hated man in Miami is murdered, Horatio Caine and the CSI team go on the hunt for his killer and his hidden treasure.
episodes.title: In Plane Sight

episodes.synopsis: Alexx Woods and Eric Delko return to help Horatio Caine and the CSI team stop a deadly viral outbreak in beautiful Miami.
episodes.title: Bad Seed

episodes.synopsis: Horatio Caine and the CSI team recreate a night of bachelor party debauchery in order to solve a murder and find a missing groom.
episodes.title: Dude, Where's My Groom

episodes.synopsis: Horatio Caine calls Las Vegas CSI Dr. Ray Langston to come to Miami when a severed leg found in the Everglades is discovered.
episodes.title: Bone Voyage

episodes.synopsis: When Horatio and the CSI team investigate who or what caused a horrific car accident, both drivers' darkest secrets are revealed.
episodes.title: Point of Impact

episodes.synopsis: In beautiful Miami deadly jellyfish are being used as murder a weapon, and a mysterious woman from Jesse's past returns.
episodes.title: Kill Clause

episodes.synopsis: The investigation of a dead census worker sends the team into a high speed car chase and an explosion that threatens the lives of two CSIs.
episodes.title: Count Me Out

episodes.synopsis: Eric Delko returns to Miami as an expert witness for the defense pitting himself against his old friends Horatio and the CSI team.
episodes.title: Delko For The Defense

episodes.synopsis: When America's sweetheart, Phoebe Nichols, bursts into flames during a concert, the CSIs expose the dark side of pop stardom.
episodes.title: Show Stopper

episodes.synopsis: The bizarre case of a man chopped in half baffles the Horatio and the CSI team, while Natalia's injury puts her and Ryan in jeopardy.
episodes.title: Die By The Sword

episodes.synopsis: Horatio and the CSI team have 24 hours to find out if a man on death row is truly guilty, and Eric Delko returns to work the case.
episodes.title: In The Wind

episodes.synopsis: Horatio Caine and the CSI team solve the murder of a man who was killed in outer space before returning his body to beautiful Miami.
episodes.title: Miami, We Have A Problem

episodes.synopsis: Horatio Caine and Delko must travel to bright and sunny Los Angeles when a secret from Jesse's past may allow a killer to go free.
episodes.title: L.A.

episodes.synopsis: Horatio Caine and the CSI team unravel a complicated workplace murder mystery when a hated receptionist is found murdered in beautiful Miami.
episodes.title: Getting Axed

episodes.synopsis: When Horatio Caine's son Kyle returns from the war, he seeks the help of his father and the CSI team to solve a disturbing murder.
episodes.title: Dishonor

episodes.synopsis: Spring Break raises the body count in Miami when Horatio Caine and the CSI team splits up to solve three different murders.
episodes.title: Spring Breakdown

episodes.synopsis: A victim's spirit won't leave Calleigh alone until she finds justice for his murder. She must enlist the help of Horatio and the rest of the CSI team.
episodes.title: Backfire

episodes.synopsis: A seemingly perfect jewelry heist ends in murder, and when crime scene evidence is stolen from the lab, Delko returns to find the culprit.
episodes.title: Meltdown

episodes.synopsis: When a suburban soccer mom is murdered, the CSIs uncover her family's dark past, while Delko continues his undercover mission.
episodes.title: Mommie Deadest

episodes.synopsis: When Horatio Caine's ex-girlfriend is killed in an explosion, the team looks within their own department to find the killer.
episodes.title: Time Bomb

episodes.synopsis: A serial killer taunts the CSIs by leaving them cryptic hints, and the longer it takes them to decode these puzzles, the higher the death toll rises.
episodes.title: All Fall Down

episodes.synopsis: The CSI team suffers the tragic loss of one of their own when a psychotic genius runs wild in otherwise beautiful Miami.
episodes.title: Fallen

episodes.synopsis: When a bottle girl is murdered at an exclusive club, Horatio must search through Miami's most elite guest list to find her killer.
episodes.title: Sudden Death

episodes.synopsis: A young girl is kidnapped and the CSIs' only witness is a blind man, who heard the abduction, leading Horatio to an old nemesis.
episodes.title: See No Evil

episodes.synopsis: When the killer of Horatio's wife busts out of prison and goes on a rampage, they must determine what he's after and find him before he strikes again.
episodes.title: Manhunt

episodes.synopsis: When a man claims to have dreamed of a murder before it happened, Horatio must send Natalia undercover for the team to determine the truth.
episodes.title: Sleepless in Miami

episodes.synopsis: When a reality star is murdered, the CSIs investigate the cast, the obsessed fans, and the stars' hidden pasts to find the killer.
episodes.title: Reality Kills

episodes.synopsis: When a fisherman narrowly escapes death, the CSI team has to dodge bullets to keep him alive and find out who's after him.
episodes.title: On the Hook

episodes.synopsis: When a pregnant woman is assaulted, Horatio and the team fight for her and her baby's life while tracking down her attacker.
episodes.title: Happy Birthday

episodes.synopsis: When a sugar refinery explodes, Horatio Caine and the CSI team make a shocking discovery about one of the factory's employees.
episodes.title: Blood Sugar

episodes.synopsis: When the investigation of a dead millionaire leads the CSIs to an elite dating service, Ryan poses as a businessman to expose the matchmaker's lies.
episodes.title: Match Made in Hell

episodes.synopsis: When a fire hydrant washes away all of the evidence at a crime scene, the CSIs must recreate a very bizarre double murder.
episodes.title: F-T-F

episodes.synopsis: When the CSIs investigate a murder at a roller derby match, the only thing shorter than the girls' skirts are their tempers.
episodes.title: Wheels Up

episodes.synopsis: Miami is ablaze with crime and chaos when Memmo Fiero, Horatio Caine's wife's killer, returns to take control of the city.
episodes.title: Last Stand

episodes.synopsis: Horatio Caine and the CSI team try to figure out which of the nerds took revenge when a high school bully is stoned to death.
episodes.title: Stoned Cold

episodes.synopsis: When a woman narrowly escapes death at the hands of a serial killer, Horatio will do anything to track down the psychopath.
episodes.title: Blood Lust

episodes.synopsis: Horatio Caine and the CSI team uncover an exclusive hunting club where the prey is human, the most dangerous game of all.
episodes.title: Hunting Ground

episodes.synopsis: When a delivery truck driver and a housewife on his route are murdered, Horatio Caine and the CSI team try to find their connection.
episodes.title: Special Delivery

episodes.synopsis: An escaped prisoner takes Natalia hostage and tells her a shocking secret about his crimes. Horatio Caine and the rest of the CSI team investigate.
episodes.title: About Face

episodes.synopsis: Horatio Caine has decided to protect a mixed martial arts fighter from his dangerous brother who recently escaped from prison.
episodes.title: Caged

episodes.synopsis: When the CSIs find a co-ed dead in a hot tub, they investigate a case marked by jealousy, psychosis and college roommates.
episodes.title: Paint It Black

episodes.synopsis: When Horatio Caine chases down a mysterious murder suspect, he discovers that the man's entire life is an elaborate charade.
episodes.title: G.O.

episodes.synopsis: After Horatio captures the last prison escapee, their transport plane crash lands, and they discover the fugitive has more planned than a getaway.
episodes.title: Mayday

episodes.synopsis: Horatio Caine and Natalia's lives hang in the balance as Horatio is all that stands between Natalia and a certain death.
episodes.title: Countermeasures

episodes.synopsis: Horatio Caine and the CSI team are led into the sexy world of male gigolos when they uncover a very unusual murder weapon.
episodes.title: Stiff

episodes.synopsis: When a tornado touches down on a murder scene, it damages the evidence while putting both Ryan and Walter in grave danger.
episodes.title: Blown Away

episodes.synopsis: Horatio Caine and the rest of the CSI team chase a sadistic killer who takes women's eyes. A new nemesis challenges Horatio Caine.
episodes.title: Look Who's Taunting

episodes.synopsis: Horatio Caine must protect a Mexican police chief from the evasive and mysterious assassin who has already killed her husband.
episodes.title: Killer Regrets

episodes.synopsis: In a deserted mansion, Horatio Caine and the CSI team find a body hanging that appears to have been killed by a vampire.
episodes.title: By the Book

episodes.synopsis: A high stakes poker game is disrupted by a masked assassin, leaving one player dead and Horatio Caine and the rest of the CSI team baffled.
episodes.title: Sinner Takes All

episodes.synopsis: When Horatio Caine finds another corpse with missing eyes, everything points to his nemesis, "The Taunter" -- except he has an airtight alibi.
episodes.title: Dead Ringer

episodes.synopsis: The CSIs investigate when three convicted murderers are released from prison and someone starts killing them one by one.
episodes.title: A Few Dead Men

episodes.synopsis: When an entire family disappears into thin air, Horatio Caine vows to find them, dead or alive, no matter how far he has to go to do it.
episodes.title: Long Gone

episodes.synopsis: Horatio Caine and the CSI team expose the seedy underbelly of children's beauty pageants when a contestant's mom is murdered.
episodes.title: Crowned

episodes.synopsis: An eccentric genius has been assassinated with the most unique weapon either Horatio Caine or the CSI team has ever seen.
episodes.title: Friendly Fire

episodes.synopsis: When a skydiver is murdered, Horatio Caine and the CSI team discover that he has more than 100 children and all of them are suspects.
episodes.title: Terminal Velocity

episodes.synopsis: When the sisters of a Miami sorority are knocked off one by one, Horatio Caine and the CSI team try to end the murder spree.
episodes.title: Last Straw

episodes.synopsis: When a neighborhood do-gooder is murdered, Horatio and the CSIs discover that he was planning to blow the whistle on something big.
episodes.title: No Good Deed

episodes.synopsis: When the "Miami Taunter" kills again, Horatio comes face-to-face with the matriarch of the suspected killer's family, who may help his investigation.
episodes.title: Rest in Pieces

episodes.synopsis: When a beloved tennis coach is nearly killed in beautiful Miami, Calleigh discovers she has a personal connection to the case.
episodes.title: At Risk

episodes.synopsis: Horatio uncovers a corruption scandal that pits him against an old adversary, and Calleigh makes a life-changing decision.
episodes.title: Law & Disorder

episodes.synopsis: When one of the CSI's biggest enemies is murdered, Horatio Caine must determine which of his team members are suspects.
episodes.title: Habeas Corpse
